content.text:
[cron:8b380d56-7314-4ba9-b4c4-ea11d3e5ca6f PR Review Patrol (High Frequency)] PR patrol for bills-bot.

Repo: /home/bill/.openclaw/workspace-build/bills-bot/

⚠️ CRITICAL RULE: Only check PRs authored by Bill (BillChirico) or by Pip Build / sub-agents. Do NOT check, fix, or address PRs from anyone else (other contributors, bots like coderabbitai, dependabot[bot], renovate[bot]) unless Bill has explicitly told you to.

Do this each run:
1) List open PRs in BillChirico/bills-bot.
2) Filter to ONLY Bill's PRs and Pip Build's PRs. Skip everything else.
3) For eligible PRs, check BOTH:
   a) Unresolved inline review threads (paginate — max 100/page, use pageInfo cursor).
   b) Top-level/high-level review comments — fetch all reviews via `gh api repos/BillChirico/bills-bot/pulls/{number}/reviews` and look for CHANGES_REQUESTED or COMMENT reviews whose body contains actionable feedback NOT already addressed by subsequent commits. Compare the review's commit_id against HEAD to see if new commits exist after the review.
4) If no unresolved threads AND no unaddressed high-level review comments on eligible PRs: respond exactly `NO_REPLY`.
5) If unresolved threads or unaddressed high-level comments exist:
   - Spawn ONE sub-agent PER PR (parallel), never batch PRs together.
   - Use agentId `build`, model `anthropic/claude-opus-4-6`, thinking `high`.
   - Include full unresolved thread details (thread id, file path, line, issue summary).
   - Include any unaddressed high-level review comment bodies and their review IDs.
   - Instruct spawned agents to read and follow CODING.md, fix all review comments (including nitpicks unless nonsensical/breaking/redundant), run tests/coverage, resolve threads.
   - Instruct spawned agents NOT to post PR summary comments unless Bill explicitly asks.
   - Have spawned agents report completion summary back to parent agent.
   - After spawning, send Bill a concise Discord DM status update:
     - channel: discord
     - target: user:191633014441115648
     - accountId: pip-build
     - include PR numbers, unresolved thread counts, and high-level comment counts.
6) If any spawned run fails/stalls, note it in DM and respawn once.

Keep updates concise and action-oriented.
Current time: Tuesday, February 17th, 2026 — 8:49 PM (America/New_York)

content.text:
[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/BillChirico/bills-bot/pulls/68","id":3292304842,"node_id":"PR_kwDORICdSM7EPJXK","html_url":"https://github.com/BillChirico/bills-bot/pull/68","diff_url":"https://github.com/BillChirico/bills-bot/pull/68.diff","patch_url":"https://github.com/BillChirico/bills-bot/pull/68.patch","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/BillChirico/bills-bot/issues/68","number":68,"state":"open","locked":false,"title":"feat: replace OpenClaw with Claude Agent SDK triage system","user":{"login":"AnExiledDev","id":696222,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjY5NjIyMg==","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/696222?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev","html_url":"https://github.com/AnExiledDev","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/received_events","type":"User","user_view_type":"public","site_admin":false},"body":"Closes #55

## Summary

- **New triage module** (`src/modules/triage.js`) — per-channel message classification with dynamic model selection (Haiku/Sonnet/Opus). Replaces the old chimeIn module with a unified evaluation loop.
- **Claude Agent SDK integration** — all AI calls now use `@anthropic-ai/claude-agent-sdk` `query()` with structured JSON output, replacing OpenClaw `fetch()` calls.
- **Dynamic evaluation intervals** — triage frequency scales with message queue depth: 0–1 msgs → 10s, 2–4 → 5s, 5+ → 2s.
- **Escalation verification** — when triage classifies Sonnet or Opus, the target model re-evaluates before generating a full response. Downgrade if simpler model suffices.
- **Instant evaluation** — @mentions, bot replies, trigger words, and moderation keywords bypass the timer.
- **Per-query cost controls** — configurable budget limits (`budget.triage`, `budget.response`) and timeouts with AbortController-based cancellation.
- **chimeIn module deleted** — functionality absorbed into triage as the `chime-in` classification.
- **Config schema updated** — new `triage` section with models, budget, timeouts, triggerWords, moderationKeywords.
- **Environment variables** — `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` replaces `OPENCLAW_API_URL` / `OPENCLAW_API_KEY`.

## Progress Report (vs. Issue #55 Requirements)

| Requirement | Status |
|-------------|--------|
| SDK `query()` replaces OpenClaw `fetch()` | ✅ Done |
| Dynamic triage interval (aggressive thresholds) | ✅ Done |
| 6-way classification (ignore/haiku/sonnet/opus/chime-in/moderate) | ✅ Done |
| Trigger words bypass timer | ✅ Done |
| Moderation keywords (spam patterns + config list) | ✅ Done |
| @mentions always respond, instant eval | ✅ Done |
| Escalation verification for Sonnet/Opus | ✅ Done |
| Model downgrade on verification | ✅ Done |
| Reasoning effort per tier (0/1024/4096 tokens) | ✅ Done |
| Buffer-only context for triage; full DB history for response | ✅ Done |
| chimeIn merged into triage, module deleted | ✅ Done |
| `moderate` logs structured warning via Winston | ✅ Done |
| SDK tool access restricted to WebSearch only | ✅ Done |
| System prompt carries personality; user prompt carries history | ✅ Done |
| Per-query cost logged (`total_cost_usd`) | ✅ Done |
| Per-query budget configurable | ✅ Done |
| SDK response timeout (30s) and triage timeout (10s) | ✅ Done |
| Config updated with triage section | ✅ Done |
| `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` replaces OpenClaw env vars | ✅ Done |
| Typing indicator while waiting | ✅ Done |
| Threading preserved (`shouldUseThread`/`getOrCreateThread`) | ✅ Preserved (no changes to threading.js) |
| HealthMonitor integration preserved | ✅ Done |
| Triage timer cleanup in graceful shutdown | ✅ Done |
| Buffer lifecycle (clear on response, preserve on ignore/moderate) | ✅ Done |
| 80% test coverage maintained | ✅ 937 tests passing (50 new triage, 29 rewritten AI) |

## Files Changed

| File | Change |
|------|--------|
| `src/modules/triage.js` | **New** — core triage module |
| `tests/modules/triage.test.js` | **New** — 50 triage tests |
| `src/modules/ai.js` | **Rewritten** — SDK `query()`, structured output |
| `src/modules/events.js` | **Rewritten** — triage-based message routing |
| `src/index.js` | Updated — triage lifecycle, removed chimeIn |
| `config.json` | New `triage` section, removed `chimeIn` |
| `package.json` / `pnpm-lock.yaml` | Added `@anthropic-ai/claude-agent-sdk` |
| `.env.example` | `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` replaces OpenClaw vars |
| `AGENTS.md` / `README.md` | Updated docs |
| `src/modules/chimeIn.js` | **Deleted** |
| `tests/modules/chimeIn.test.js` | **Deleted** |

## Test plan

- [x] All 937 existing tests pass (`pnpm test`)
- [ ] Manual smoke test: deploy to staging, mention bot in Discord channel, verify triage classification and model-appropriate response
- [ ] Verify escalation verification fires for complex questions (check logs for "Escalation downgraded" entries)
- [ ] Verify trigger words cause instant evaluation (check logs for "Trigger word detected")
- [ ] Confirm `moderate` classification logs structured warning without taking action
- [ ] Verify graceful shutdown stops triage timers details.aggregated:
[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/BillChirico/bills-bot/pulls/68","id":3292304842,"node_id":"PR_kwDORICdSM7EPJXK","html_url":"https://github.com/BillChirico/bills-bot/pull/68","diff_url":"https://github.com/BillChirico/bills-bot/pull/68.diff","patch_url":"https://github.com/BillChirico/bills-bot/pull/68.patch","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/BillChirico/bills-bot/issues/68","number":68,"state":"open","locked":false,"title":"feat: replace OpenClaw with Claude Agent SDK triage system","user":{"login":"AnExiledDev","id":696222,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjY5NjIyMg==","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/696222?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev","html_url":"https://github.com/AnExiledDev","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/AnExiledDev/received_events","type":"User","user_view_type":"public","site_admin":false},"body":"Closes #55

## Summary

- **New triage module** (`src/modules/triage.js`) — per-channel message classification with dynamic model selection (Haiku/Sonnet/Opus). Replaces the old chimeIn module with a unified evaluation loop.
- **Claude Agent SDK integration** — all AI calls now use `@anthropic-ai/claude-agent-sdk` `query()` with structured JSON output, replacing OpenClaw `fetch()` calls.
- **Dynamic evaluation intervals** — triage frequency scales with message queue depth: 0–1 msgs → 10s, 2–4 → 5s, 5+ → 2s.
- **Escalation verification** — when triage classifies Sonnet or Opus, the target model re-evaluates before generating a full response. Downgrade if simpler model suffices.
- **Instant evaluation** — @mentions, bot replies, trigger words, and moderation keywords bypass the timer.
- **Per-query cost controls** — configurable budget limits (`budget.triage`, `budget.response`) and timeouts with AbortController-based cancellation.
- **chimeIn module deleted** — functionality absorbed into triage as the `chime-in` classification.
- **Config schema updated** — new `triage` section with models, budget, timeouts, triggerWords, moderationKeywords.
- **Environment variables** — `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` replaces `OPENCLAW_API_URL` / `OPENCLAW_API_KEY`.

## Progress Report (vs. Issue #55 Requirements)

| Requirement | Status |
|-------------|--------|
| SDK `query()` replaces OpenClaw `fetch()` | ✅ Done |
| Dynamic triage interval (aggressive thresholds) | ✅ Done |
| 6-way classification (ignore/haiku/sonnet/opus/chime-in/moderate) | ✅ Done |
| Trigger words bypass timer | ✅ Done |
| Moderation keywords (spam patterns + config list) | ✅ Done |
| @mentions always respond, instant eval | ✅ Done |
| Escalation verification for Sonnet/Opus | ✅ Done |
| Model downgrade on verification | ✅ Done |
| Reasoning effort per tier (0/1024/4096 tokens) | ✅ Done |
| Buffer-only context for triage; full DB history for response | ✅ Done |
| chimeIn merged into triage, module deleted | ✅ Done |
| `moderate` logs structured warning via Winston | ✅ Done |
| SDK tool access restricted to WebSearch only | ✅ Done |
| System prompt carries personality; user prompt carries history | ✅ Done |
| Per-query cost logged (`total_cost_usd`) | ✅ Done |
| Per-query budget configurable | ✅ Done |
| SDK response timeout (30s) and triage timeout (10s) | ✅ Done |
| Config updated with triage section | ✅ Done |
| `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` replaces OpenClaw env vars | ✅ Done |
| Typing indicator while waiting | ✅ Done |
| Threading preserved (`shouldUseThread`/`getOrCreateThread`) | ✅ Preserved (no changes to threading.js) |
| HealthMonitor integration preserved | ✅ Done |
| Triage timer cleanup in graceful shutdown | ✅ Done |
| Buffer lifecycle (clear on response, preserve on ignore/moderate) | ✅ Done |
| 80% test coverage maintained | ✅ 937 tests passing (50 new triage, 29 rewritten AI) |

## Files Changed

| File | Change |
|------|--------|
| `src/modules/triage.js` | **New** — core triage module |
| `tests/modules/triage.test.js` | **New** — 50 triage tests |
| `src/modules/ai.js` | **Rewritten** — SDK `query()`, structured output |
| `src/modules/events.js` | **Rewritten** — triage-based message routing |
| `src/index.js` | Updated — triage lifecycle, removed chimeIn |
| `config.json` | New `triage` section, removed `chimeIn` |
| `package.json` / `pnpm-lock.yaml` | Added `@anthropic-ai/claude-agent-sdk` |
| `.env.example` | `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` replaces OpenClaw vars |
| `AGENTS.md` / `README.md` | Updated docs |
| `src/modules/chimeIn.js` | **Deleted** |
| `tests/modules/chimeIn.test.js` | **Deleted** |

## Test plan

- [x] All 937 existing tests pass (`pnpm test`)
- [ ] Manual smoke test: deploy to staging, mention bot in Discord channel, verify triage classification and model-appropriate response
- [ ] Verify escalation verification fires for complex questions (check logs for "Escalation downgraded" entries)
- [ ] Verify trigger words cause instant evaluation (check logs for "Trigger word detected")
- [ ] Confirm `moderate` classification logs structured warning without taking action
- [ ] Verify graceful shutdown stops triage timers
